developer: Stingray Music USA Inc. and iNiS Corporation

description.full: Bring the party to your house and sing to over 8,000 songs from the latest hits to the oldies but goodies!  Your avatar will go on stage and sing to your voice with a full complement of stage props and back band.  Songs don't require any download and will playback immediately via streaming for a robust karaoke experience.  Requires an Xbox 360 Headset, Xbox Wireless Microphone or Xbox 360 compatible USB microphone.
